title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: There is a bug in Photon where the popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected: A popup menu should appear that allows the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
Actual: No popup menu appears.
EB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, a popup menu should appear that allows the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler to trigger the popup menu.
3) Verify that the popup menu appears and allows the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
